reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night in August 2012. A very warm welcome from a lovely lady. The rooms were very comfortable and the view from our room magnificent. I would definitely recommend it to other travellers especially those going to the beautiful Isle of a mull.
reviews.title: Lovely guest house.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time at the Invercloy, one of my best memories of the trip. they have a beautiful terrace that overlooks the town and the water... perfect to watch the sunset and sip on some wine. our room had a beautiful view and the innkeeper was very helpful, and very low key. you barely knew she was there unless you needed something. This guest house does not have a breakfast, but Oban has a lot of great food options so it wasn't a big deal. they also offer free parking and internet. Would recommend this to anyone!
reviews.title: beautiful views

reviews.text: Stay was comfortable and entertaining...lol... apparently we were in Oban one day before the Bagpipes competition...one of the contestants was also staying in this guest house and was practicing...only in Scotland!! WOW...anyhow, the hostess was very informative and they made us feel very welcomed. The room was spacious, clean and they had Wi-Fi which was helpful using my droid phone. I could not call out on my cell but I could use the chat and message everyone...
reviews.title: Excellence and Charming Host of Guest House!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the room at the back with a view of McCraig's Tower and the view of the bay was out the front door... Get a taxi to bring you and your luggage to the door. Everything is up hill but take a stroll down back to the bay. Neighborhood is quiet...
reviews.title: Cute Guest House with a great view!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will go back and stay longer...would love to sit and chat with the host and her family for a bit...
reviews.title: Warm and welcoming

reviews.text: Invercloy is a basic but well run room only Guest House with unexpected extras such as good toiletries, bathrobes etc that you would not expect to find in this style of establishment. The owners were very friendly and my single room looked directly over the bay. It was excellent value for money in this tourist town and I would have no hesitation in staying there again.
reviews.title: Good Value, Nice Owners, Went the extra mile!

reviews.text: Beautiful Guesthouse (note without the breakfast though - but this is clear on their website) Amazing view over Oban. Comfortable room will all amenities including ensuite. Extra touches made this place memorable, fresh coffee, lovely busicuts and electric blankets to name a few. Easy to walk into town, although it is up a hill so if you have mobility issues might not be the easiest location to walk to and from. If you have a car then its no problem. If I were ever back in Oban I would stay here
reviews.title: Beautiful Views over Oban

reviews.text: If you’re fit enough to manage long steep stairs, called Jacob’s Ladder, down to the town centre it takes about 5 to 10 minutes to walk there. The ferry and rail station are about another 10 minutes away. Taxi fares from the railway station area varied between £2.70 and £3.50

Great guest house. Four gents used this as a base to explore the area. It was ideal for us as it was just 10 minutes for those early walks down to the ferry terminal, (if you use the steps). Fiona and her family welcomed us and made us comfortable in our comings and going over the few days we were there.
reviews.title: Invercloy guest house, Oban

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a lovely guest house. Fiona welcomed us and made us feel totally at home from the start. The room was a little small but very cosy with great views over the bay. Beautiful bed linen, a good selection on the tea tray, lovely fluffy towels and good quality toiletries in the bathroom.
